meanings.definition: A type of bacterium that is comma-shaped.
meanings.sent1: Under the microscope, the vibrio looked like a tiny, curved line.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study vibrios to understand their unique shape and behavior.
meanings.sent3: The vibrio bacteria at the party were all lined up in a row, chatting away.
meanings.sent4: The vibrio's shape, like a graceful dancer, twirled under the lens.
meanings.sent5: In the pond, the vibrio wiggled and danced in the water, catching the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A genus of bacteria that are typically found in aquatic environments.
meanings.sent1: The vibrio genus includes many different types of bacteria living in water.
meanings.sent2: Researchers study the behavior of vibrios to understand their impact on aquatic ecosystems.
meanings.sent3: The vibrio family reunion by the lake was a splashy affair.
meanings.sent4: In the ocean, the vibrio bacteria swam together like a synchronized team.
meanings.sent5: The vibrio colony thrived in the underwater world, creating a vibrant community.

meanings.definition: Any of various bacteria of the genus Vibrio, some of which cause food poisoning.
meanings.sent1: Be careful with the vibrio bacteria in your food to avoid getting sick.
meanings.sent2: Health inspectors check for vibrios in restaurants to ensure food safety.
meanings.sent3: The vibrio party in the fridge turned into a food poisoning disaster.
meanings.sent4: The vibrio troublemakers wreaked havoc in the stomachs of unsuspecting diners.
meanings.sent5: The vibrio villains invaded the picnic, causing chaos and upset stomachs.
